body#layout:before{content:'TS UI';position:absolute;top:25px;left:43%;font-size:20px;font-family:var(--font-head);background:linear-gradient(to right,#f81894,#0000ff,#f81894);border-radius:5px;padding:10px 20px;color:#ffffff}
body#layout{width:1025px;margin:0 !important;padding:100px 0 70px 0!important;border:0!important;text-align:left !important;position:relative}
body#layout div.section{border-radius:5px}
body#layout .section h4{font-size:15px !important;margin-left:0!important}
body#layout .add_widget{background:linear-gradient(to right,#1022ac,#7e3f26);color:#ffffff!important}
body#layout .add_widget:hover{background:#000000!important}
body#layout .add_widget a{font-size:13px!important;color:#ffffff!important}
body#layout .add_widget a:hover{text-decoration:none}
body#layout .widget-content{border-radius:5px!important;margin-bottom:5px}
body#layout header, body#layout .mainContent, body#layout .footerContent, body#layout .errorContent{border-top:1px solid #e5e5e5;padding:30px 0 30px;position:relative}
body#layout header:before,body#layout .mainContent:before,body#layout .footerContent:before,body#layout .mobileContent:before,body#layout .errorContent:before{position:absolute;top:-14px;left:20px;padding:5px 20px;border:1px solid #e5e5e5;border-radius:20px;font-size:.8rem;font-family:var(--font-head);color:rgba(0,0,0,0.52);background:#f1f1f1}
body#layout header:before{content:'Header'}
body#layout .headerContent, body#layout .mainContent, body#layout .blogContent, body#layout .mobileContent{display:flex}
body#layout header .headersec{width:40%}
body#layout header .Header_Search_Widget,body#layout header .Header_Menu_Widget{width:30%}
body#layout .mainContent:before{content:'Main Content'}
body#layout .mainContent .mainMenusec{width:30%}
body#layout .mainContent .mainInner{width:70%}
body#layout .blogContent .mainbar, body#layout .blogContent .sidebar{width:50%}
body#layout .footerContent:before{content:'Footer Credit'}
body#layout .footerContent, body#layout .errorContent{width:100%}
body#layout .mobileContent{border-top:1px solid #e5e5e5;padding:30px 0 30px;position:relative}
body#layout .mobileContent:before{content:'Mobile Menu'}
body#layout .mobileContent .mobileMenusec{width:70%}
body#layout .mobileContent .postFeaturesec{width:30%}
body#layout .errorContent:before{content:'Error Page'}
body#layout .errorContent:after{content:'Designed By Techly Series';position:absolute;bottom:-35px;left:36%;font-size:15px;font-family:var(--font-head);background:linear-gradient(to right,#f81894,#0000ff,#f81894);border-radius:5px;padding:10px 20px;color:#ffffff}





<Group description="Address Bar Colour">
<Variable name="abColor" description="Address Bar Colour" type="color" default="#ffffff" value="#ffffff"/>
</Group>

<Group description="Basic Colours">
<Variable name="body.bg" description="Background Colour" type="color" default="#ffffff" value="#ffffff"/>
<Variable name="transparent.bg" description="Transparent Background" type="color" default="transparent" value="transparent"/>
<Variable name="alt.color" description="All Text and Icon Colour" type="color" default="#000000" value="#000000"/>
<Variable name="button.alt" description="Button Text Colour" type="color" default="#ffffff" value="#ffffff"/>
<Variable name="link.color" description="Link Colour" type="color" default="#0000FF" value="#0000FF"/>
<Variable name="border1" description="Border Colour 1" type="color" default="#dddddd" value="#dddddd"/>
<Variable name="border2" description="Border Colour 2" type="color" default="#1e1e1e" value="#1e1e1e"/>
</Group>

<Group description="Basic Colours [ Dark Mode ]">
<Variable name="dark.bg" description="Background Colour [ Dark Mode ]" type="color" default="#1e1e1e" value="#1e1e1e"/>
<Variable name="dark.alt" description="All Text and Icon Colour [ Dark Mode ]" type="color" default="#ffffff" value="#ffffff"/>
<Variable name="dark.link" description="Link Colour [ Dark Mode ]" type="color" default="#ff0000" value="#ff0000"/>
<Variable name="dark.border" description="Border Colour [ Dark Mode ]" type="color" default="#ffffff" value="#ffffff"/>
</Group>

<Group description="Font Styles">
<Variable name="font.head" description="Font Head" type="font" default="Ubuntu" value="Ubuntu"/>
<Variable name="font.body" description="Font Body" type="font" default="Josefin Sans" value="Josefin Sans"/>
</Group>

<Group description="Font Sizes">
<Variable name="widget.titleSize" description="Widget Title Size" type="length" default="20px" max="25px" value="20px"/>
<Variable name="post.titleSize" description="Post Title Size [ Desktop ]" type="length" default="25px" max="28px" value="25px"/>
<Variable name="post.titleSizeMobile" description="Post Title Size [ Mobile ]" type="length" default="22px" max="25px" value="22px"/>
<Variable name="post.fontSize" description="Post Font Size [ Desktop ]" type="length" default="16px" max="18px" value="16px"/>
<Variable name="post.fontSizeMobile" description="Post Font Size [ Mobile ]" type="length" default="15px" max="17px" value="15px"/>
</Group>

<Group description="Height and Width">
<Variable name="page.maxContent" description="Page Max Width" type="length" default="780px" max="900px" value="780px"/>
<Variable name="header.height" description="Header Height" type="length" default="55px" max="75px" value="55px"/>
<Variable name="nav.width" description="Navbar Max Width" type="length" default="230px" max="250px" value="230px"/>
<Variable name="mob.menu.height" description="Mobile Menu Height" type="length" default="55px" max="75px" value="55px"/>
</Group>

<Group description="Comment Section [ Do Not Edit ] - Required">
<Variable name="body.background" description="Background" color="#505050" type="background" default="$(color) none repeat scroll center center"  value="$(color) url() no-repeat scroll center center"/>
<Variable name="body.text.font" description="Font Blogger comment" type="font" default="Philosopher" value="Philosopher"/>
<Variable name="body.text.color" description="Color" type="color" default="#505050"  value="#505050"/>
<Variable name="body.link.color" description="Link color" type="color" default="#262d3d"  value="#989b9f"/>
<Variable name="posts.title.color" description="Post title color" type="color" default="#262d3d"  value="#989b9f"/>
<Variable name="posts.text.color" description="Post text color" type="color" default="#48525c"  value="#989b9f"/>
<Variable name="posts.icons.color" description="Post info color" type="color" default="#262d3d" value="#989b9f"/>
<Variable name="posts.background.color" description="Post background color" type="color" default="#f7f7fc"  value="transparent"/>
<Variable name="tabs.font" description="Font" type="font" default="Philosopher" value="Philosopher"/>
<Variable name="tabs.color" description="Text color" type="color" default="#4d4d4d"  value="#08102b"/>
<Variable name="tabs.selected.color" description="Selected color" type="color" default="#fff"  value="#fffdfc"/>
<Variable name="tabs.overflow.background.color" description="Popup background color" type="color" default="$(posts.background.color)"  value="#fffdfc"/>
<Variable name="tabs.overflow.color" description="Popup text color" type="color" default="#48525c"  value="#08102b"/>
<Variable name="tabs.overflow.selected.color" description="Popup selected color" type="color" default="#262d3d"  value="#989b9f"/>
<Variable name="labels.background.color" description="Labels background color" type="color" default="#fff" value="#fffdfc"/>
<Variable name="blog.title.font" description="Blog title font" type="font" default="Philosopher" value="Philosopher"/>
<Variable name="blog.title.color" description="Blog title color" type="color" default="#fff" value="#fffdfc"/>
</Group>@font-face{}

/* Head Font */
@font-face{font-family:'Ubuntu';font-style:normal;font-display:swap;src:url(https://fonts.gstatic.com/s/ubuntu/v19/4iCs6KVjbNBYlgoKfw72nU6AFw.woff2) format('woff2')}

/* Body Font */
@font-face{font-family:'Josefin Sans';font-style:normal;font-display:swap;src:url(https://fonts.gstatic.com/s/josefinsans/v23/Qw3PZQNVED7rKGKxtqIqX5E-AVSJrOCfjY46_DjQbMZhLybvUVw.woff2) format('woff2')}

/* Variable Items */
:root{--body-bg:$(body.bg);
--transparent-bg:$(transparent.bg);
--alt-color:$(alt.color);
--button-alt:$(button.alt);
--link-color:$(link.color);
--border1:$(border1);
--border2:$(border2);
--dark-bg:$(dark.bg);
--dark-border:$(dark.border);
--dark-alt:$(dark.alt);
--dark-link:$(dark.link);
--font-head:$(font.head);
--font-body:$(font.body);
--linear-bg1:linear-gradient(to right,#cc2b5e,#753a88);
--linear-bg1-hover:linear-gradient(to left,#cc2b5e,#753a88);
--linear-bg2:linear-gradient(to right,#f81894,#0000ff);
--linear-bg2-hover:linear-gradient(to left,#f81894,#0000ff);
--page-maxContent:$(page.maxContent);
--header-height:$(header.height);
--mob-menu-height:$(mob.menu.height);
--nav-width:$(nav.width);
--nav-border:2px;
--widget-titleSize:$(widget.titleSize);
--widget-titleWeight:600;
--post-titleSize:$(post.titleSize);
--post-titleSizeMobile:$(post.titleSizeMobile);
--post-fontSize:$(post.fontSize);
--post-fontSizeMobile:$(post.fontSizeMobile);
--transition-all1:all .2s linear;
--transition-all2:all .3s linear}

/* Standar CSS */
::selection{background:var(--link-color);color:var(--dark-alt);text-shadow:0 0 5px var(--alt-color)}iframe,img{max-width:100%}.fullClose,.invisible{visibility:hidden}.free:after,.new:after,.star:after,a{color:var(--link-color)}.darkMode ::selection{background:var(--dark-link)}*,:after,:before{-webkit-box-sizing:border-box;box-sizing:border-box}h1,h2,h3,h4,h5,h6{margin:0;font-weight:700;font-family:var(--font-head)}h1{font-size:1.8rem}h2{font-size:1.7rem}h3{font-size:1.5rem}h4{font-size:1.3rem}h5{font-size:1.2rem}h6{font-size:1.1rem}a{cursor:not-allowed;text-decoration:none}input,select{font-family:var(--font-body)}button{font-family:var(--font-body)}table{border-spacing:0}iframe{border:0;margin-left:auto;margin-right:auto}img{display:block;position:relative;height:auto}svg{width:22px;height:22px;fill:var(--alt-color)}svg .line,svg.line{fill:none!important;stroke:var(--alt-color);stroke-linecap:round;stroke-linejoin:round;stroke-width:1}.hidden,.replaced{display:none}.clear{width:100%;display:block;margin:0;padding:0;float:none;clear:both}.fullClose{display:block;position:fixed;top:0;left:0;right:0;bottom:0;z-index:2;transition:var(--transition-all1);background:0 0;opacity:0}.free,.new,.star{position:relative}.free:after,.new:after{display:inline-block;position:absolute;top:-3px;font-size:85%;font-weight:400;margin:0 5px}.star:after{content:'*';font-size:15px;font-weight:700}.new:after{content:'New!'}.free:after{content:'Free!'}.darkMode .free:after,.darkMode .new:after,.darkMode .star:after{color:var(--dark-link)}button,input,textarea,select{outline:none}.flippanel{display:none}code,kbd{user-select:text!important}



<style>/**/
/* Body Section */
.mainWrapper,body{position:relative}html{scroll-behavior:smooth;overflow-x:hidden}body{top:0!important;margin:0!important;padding:0!important;width:100%;font-family:var(--font-body);font-size:15px;color:var(--alt-color);letter-spacing:.08em;background:var(--body-bg);-webkit-font-smoothing:antialiased;word-break:break-word}

/* Header Section */
header{position:fixed;left:0;top:0;right:0;overflow:hidden;background:var(--body-bg);color:var(--alt-color);box-shadow:0 0 5px var(--dark-bg);z-index:10;transition:var(--transition-all1)}.darkMode header{box-shadow:0 0 5px var(--body-bg)}header a{color:inherit}header svg{fill:var(--alt-color)}header svg .line,header svg.line{fill:none;stroke:var(--alt-color)}.Header{margin:auto 0;background-repeat:no-repeat;background-size:100%;background-position:center}.Header a{display:block}.Header img{max-width:150px;max-height:50px;margin:0 auto;cursor:not-allowed}.Header img:hover{animation:3s linear infinite rotating}.Header h1,.Header h2{display:block;font-size:22px;font-weight:700;color:inherit;text-align:center}.Header h1 a:hover,.Header h2 a:hover{color:var(--link-color)}.Header .headerTitle{max-width:185px;overflow:hidden;white-space:nowrap;text-overflow:ellipsis;display:block;margin:0 auto}.headerContent{position:relative;height:var(--header-height);display:flex;align-items:center}.darkMode .Header h1 a:hover,.darkMode .Header h2 a:hover{color:var(--dark-link)}

/* Header Menu */
.headerLeft .headerIcon,.headerRight{margin-right:20px}.headerDiv,.headerIcon{display:flex;align-items:center}.headerIcon>*{display:flex;align-items:center;position:relative}.headerLeft{padding-left:24px;flex:0 0 auto;width:var(--nav-width)}#dark-svg-2,#full-svg-2,#read-svg-2,.darkMode #dark-svg-1,.headerIcon a.navMenu,.readMode #read-svg-1{display:none}.headerIcon a.navMenu:after{content:attr(data-text);margin:3px 0 0 8px}.headerRight{flex:1 0 auto;width:auto}.headerRight .headerIcon{margin-left:auto;position:relative}.headerMenu{display:flex;align-items:center;margin:0;padding:0;list-style:none}.headerMenu li>*{display:inline-flex;margin:0 10px}.darkMode #dark-svg-2,.readMode #read-svg-2{display:block}

/* Header Search */
.Header_Search_Widget{flex-shrink:0;position:absolute;right:234px;box-shadow:0 0 3px var(--dark-bg) inset;border-radius:5px}.Header_Search_Widget:hover{box-shadow:0 0 5px var(--link-color) inset}.Header_Search_Widget form{position:relative;width:100%;font-size:95%}.Header_Search_Widget input{display:block;width:100%;outline:0;border:0;background:var(--transparent-bg);border-radius:5px;padding:12px 45px}.Header_Search_Widget input:focus~.close{opacity:1;visibility:visible}.Header_Search_Widget button{background:0 0;border:0;outline:0;padding:0;position:absolute;left:15px;top:0;bottom:0;display:flex;align-items:center}.Header_Search_Widget button svg{width:14px;height:14px;opacity:.7}.darkMode .Header_Search_Widget button svg{fill:var(--dark-alt)}.Header_Search_Widget button.close{right:12px;left:auto;opacity:0;visibility:hidden}.Header_Search_Widget button.close svg{width:22px;height:22px}

/* Mobile Menu */
.Mobile_Menu_Widget{display:none;position:fixed;left:0;right:0;bottom:0;background:var(--body-bg);overflow:hidden;padding:0 20px;box-shadow:0 0 5px var(--dark-bg);transition:var(--transition-all1);z-index:2}.darkMode .Mobile_Menu_Widget{box-shadow:0 0 5px var(--body-bg)}.mobileMenu{display:flex;align-items:center;justify-content:space-around;height:var(--mob-menu-height);margin:0;padding:0;list-style:none}.mobileMenu li>*{display:inline-flex;position:relative}.mobileMenu li>:hover::after{content:'';height:4px;width:100%;border-radius:5px;position:absolute;bottom:-18px;background:var(--link-color)}.darkMode .mobileMenu li>:hover::after{background:var(--dark-link)}.mobileMenu li svg{fill:var(--alt-color);color:var(--alt-color)}.darkMode .mobileMenu li svg{fill:var(--dark-alt);color:var(--dark-alt)}.mComment svg,.mDark svg,.mHome svg,.mRead svg,.mShare svg{width:23px;height:23px}.mMenu svg{width:26px;height:26px;stroke-width:1.5px}.mSearch svg{width:20px;height:20px}

/* Features */
.Fbutton,.Fbuttons div{bottom:75px;right:25px}.Fbuttons{list-style:none}.Fbutton{display:flex;position:fixed;background:var(--body-bg);box-shadow:0 0 5px var(--dark-bg);border-radius:50px;z-index:5;overflow:hidden;width:45px;height:45px;font-size:18px;align-items:center;justify-content:center;transition:.2s,margin 1s}.Fbuttons div{z-index:4;box-shadow:none;opacity:0}.Fbuttons div:hover{animation:1s rubberBand}.Fcheck:checked+.Fbutton{transform:rotate(360deg)}.Fbutton .svg-2,.Fcheck:checked+.Fbutton .svg-1{display:none}.Fcheck:checked+.Fbutton .svg-2{display:block}.Fcheck:checked~.Fbuttons div{box-shadow:0 0 5px var(--dark-bg);opacity:1}.Fcheck:checked~.Fbuttons div.Top{bottom:130px}.Fcheck:checked~.Fbuttons div.Dark{right:80px}.Fcheck:checked~.Fbuttons div.Read{right:135px}.darkMode .Fbutton{background:var(--dark-bg);color:var(--dark-alt)}.darkMode .Fbutton,.darkMode .Fcheck:checked~.Fbuttons div{box-shadow:0 0 6px var(--body-bg)}

/* Main Menu */
.mainMenusec,.mainMenusec .fullClose.menu,.mainMenusec .section{transition:var(--transition-all1)}.mainInner,.mainMenu .link,.mainMenu>li,.mainMenu>li li a{position:relative}.mainInner{margin-left:var(--nav-width);padding:75px 25px 25px}.mainMenusec{position:fixed;top:0;left:0;bottom:0;width:var(--nav-width);background:var(--body-bg);box-shadow:0 0 5px var(--dark-bg);font-size:17px;color:var(--alt-color);z-index:2}.darkMode .mainMenusec{box-shadow:0 0 5px var(--body-bg)}.mainMenusec .close,.navInput:checked~.mainWrapper .mainMenu .link .name,.navInput:checked~.mainWrapper .mainMenu .link svg.bi-caret-down,.navInput:checked~.mainWrapper .mainMenusec #HTML1,.navInput:checked~.mainWrapper .mainMenusec #LinkList2 ul{display:none}.mainMenusec .section{padding-top:calc(var(--header-height) + 10px);padding-bottom:90px;height:100%}.mainMenusec .section:hover{overflow-y:auto}.mainMenu .link .name,.mainMenu .link:before,.mainMenu>li li a:before{display:block;white-space:nowrap;overflow:hidden;text-overflow:ellipsis}.mainMenusec svg{width:23px;height:23px;fill:var(--alt-color);margin-bottom:auto}.mainMenusec svg.line{fill:none;stroke:var(--alt-color)}.mainMenusec ul{margin:0;padding:0;list-style:none}.mainMenu .link:hover,.mainMenu>li li a:hover{box-shadow:0 0 3px var(--dark-bg) inset}.darkMode .mainMenu .link:hover,.darkMode .mainMenu>li li a:hover{box-shadow:0 0 3px var(--body-bg) inset}.mainMenu>li:hover{color:var(--link-color)}.darkMode .mainMenu>li:hover{color:var(--dark-link)}.mainMenu>li.break:after{content:'';display:block;width:calc(100% - 50px);border-bottom:1px solid var(--border1);margin:12px 25px}.mainMenu>li li,.navInput:checked~.mainWrapper .mainMenu .dropMenu:checked~ul li{max-height:0;opacity:0;visibility:hidden}.mainMenu>li li a{white-space:nowrap;display:block;color:inherit;opacity:.7}.mainMenu .link:before,.mainMenu>li li a:before{content:'';position:absolute;top:0;left:0;bottom:0;background:0 0;width:3px;border-radius:0 5px 5px 0}.mainMenu .link:hover:before,.mainMenu>li li a:hover:before{background:var(--link-color);opacity:.7}.darkMode .mainMenu .link:hover:before,.darkMode .mainMenu>li li a:hover:before{background:var(--dark-link);opacity:.7}#LinkList2 label:hover svg,.mainMenu .link:hover svg,.socialLink li .link:hover svg{color:var(--link-color);fill:var(--link-color)}#LinkList2 label:hover svg.line,.mainMenu .link:hover svg.line,.socialLink li .link:hover svg.line{fill:none;stroke:var(--link-color)}.darkMode #LinkList2 label:hover svg,.darkMode .mainMenu .link:hover svg,.darkMode .socialLink li .link:hover svg{color:var(--dark-link);fill:var(--dark-link)}.darkMode #LinkList2 label:hover svg.line,.darkMode .mainMenu .link:hover svg.line,.darkMode .socialLink li .link:hover svg.line{fill:none;stroke:var(--dark-link)}.mainMenu .link{white-space:nowrap;display:flex;align-items:center;width:100%;padding:10px 15px;color:inherit}.mainMenu .link svg{flex-shrink:0;margin-left:9.1px;margin-right:15px}.mainMenu .link .name{font-weight:400}.mainMenu a.link:hover,.mainMenu>li li a:hover{background:var(--transparent-bg)}.mainMenu .link svg.bi-caret-down{margin-left:auto;margin-right:0}.mainMenu .dropMenu:checked~.link svg.bi-caret-down{transform:rotate(180deg)}.mainMenu .dropMenu:checked~ul li{max-height:40px;margin-left:13px;opacity:1;visibility:visible}.navInput:checked~.mainWrapper .mainInner,.navInput:checked~.mainWrapper footer{margin-left:68px}.navInput:checked~.mainWrapper .mainMenusec{width:75px}.navInput:checked~.mainWrapper .mainMenusec #LinkList2{width:calc(68px - var(--nav-border))}.navInput:checked~.mainWrapper .mainMenusec #LinkList2 label{display:flex;opacity:1;visibility:visible}.navInput:checked~.mainWrapper .mainMenu a.link:hover{background:0 0}.navInput:checked~.mainWrapper .mainMenu>li.break:after{width:calc(100% - 45px)}#HTML1{margin-top:50px}

@media screen and (max-width:896px){.Header_Search_Widget,.mainMenusec .section,header{position:fixed;top:0;left:0}#LinkList2,.mainMenusec .section{margin-left:-100%;width:75%;max-width:475px}header{right:0}.Header .headerTitle{max-width:185px}.headerLeft{width:auto;flex-grow:1;padding-right:20px}.headerRight{width:auto;flex:0 0 auto}.Header_Search_Widget{right:0;padding:0 16px;max-width:none;z-index:10}.Header_Search_Widget button{z-index:3}.Header_Search_Widget input{position:relative;background:var(--body-bg);padding:20px 42px;margin-top:-100%;box-shadow:0 0 10px var(--dark-bg) inset;z-index:3}.Header_Search_Widget input:focus{margin-top:25px}.Header_Search_Widget input:focus~.fullClose.search{background:#222;opacity:.9;visibility:visible}.Mobile_Menu_Widget,.navInput:checked~.mainWrapper .mainMenu .link .name,.navInput:checked~.mainWrapper .mainMenu .link svg.bi-caret-down{display:block}.mainMenusec{right:0;width:100%;background:0 0;overflow:hidden;opacity:0;visibility:hidden;border-right:0;z-index:11}.mainMenusec .section{background:var(--body-bg);bottom:0;padding-top:50px;z-index:3;overflow-y:auto;box-shadow:0 0 10px var(--dark-bg);border-radius:0 15px 15px 0}.mainMenusec .close{display:block;position:absolute;top:10px;right:20px}.mainMenusec .close svg{width:35px;height:35px}.darkMode .mainMenusec .section{box-shadow:0 0 10px var(--body-bg)}#LinkList2,.mainMenu .link{padding-left:20px;padding-right:20px}.mainMenu>li li a{padding:10px 20px 10px 55px}.mainMenu>li.break:after{width:calc(100% - 40px);margin-left:20px;margin-right:20px}.navInput:checked~.mainWrapper .mainMenusec{width:100%;opacity:1;visibility:visible}.mainInner,.navInput:checked~.mainWrapper .mainInner,.navInput:checked~.mainWrapper .mainMenusec .section,.navInput:checked~.mainWrapper footer{margin-left:0}.navInput:checked~.mainWrapper .mainMenusec .fullClose.menu{background:#222;opacity:.8;visibility:visible}.navInput:checked~.mainWrapper .mainMenu .dropMenu:checked~ul li{max-height:40px;opacity:1;visibility:visible}.navInput:checked~.mainWrapper .mainMenu a.link:hover{background:var(--transparent-bg)}.navInput:checked~.mainWrapper .mainMenusec #LinkList2{width:75%;max-width:475px;margin-left:0}.navInput:checked~.mainWrapper .mainMenusec #LinkList2 label{display:none}.navInput:checked~.mainWrapper .mainMenusec #LinkList2 ul{display:flex}}

/* Widget Social Media */
.socialLink{display:flex;align-items:flex-start;justify-content:center;margin:0;padding:0;list-style:none}.socialLink li{margin:0 7px}.socialLink li .link{display:flex;align-items:center}.socialLink li a{opacity:.8;cursor:not-allowed}#LinkList2{position:fixed;left:0;right:0;bottom:0;width:calc(var(--nav-width) - var(--nav-border));background:var(--body-bg);border-radius:0 15px 15px 0;padding:20px 20px 30px 33px;transition:var(--transition-all1)}#LinkList2 ul{justify-content:flex-start}#LinkList2 li:first-child{margin-left:0}#LinkList2 label{display:none;align-items:center;opacity:0;visibility:hidden}

/* blogContent Section */

/* Footer */
footer{display:flex;align-items:baseline;justify-content:center;padding:25px;overflow:hidden;white-space:nowrap;margin-left:var(--nav-width);font-size:15px}.darkMode footer{border-color:var(--dark-border)}

/* Error Page */
.error404{background:linear-gradient(to right,#3a3c85,#e90451);align-items:center;display:flex;flex-direction:column;height:100vh;justify-content:center;text-align:center;padding:0;margin:0}.Error_Page_Widget{margin:auto}.Error_Page_Widget h3{display:block;white-space:nowrap;font-size:150px;font-family:var(--font-body);color:#fff}.Error_Page_Widget h3 svg{animation:2s linear infinite alternate bounce;fill:#ffffff;width:150px;height:155px;margin:0 0 0 3px}.Error_Page_Widget span{font-size:25px;color:#fff}.Error_Page_Widget p{margin:30px 5%;line-height:1.6em;font-family:var(--font-body);color:#fff}.Error_Page_Widget .Button button{background:var(--body-bg);border:0;border-radius:5px;color:var(--alt-color);font-size:15px;padding:10px 15px}.Error_Page_Widget .Button button:hover{box-shadow:0 0 10px var(--dark-bg)}

/* Keyframes Animation */
@keyframes rotating{from{transform:rotate(0deg)}to{transform:rotate(360deg)}}@keyframes bounce{from{transform:translate3d(0,-30px,0)}to{transform:translate3d(0,10px,0)}}@keyframes rubberBand{from{transform:scale3d(1,1,1)}30%{transform:scale3d(1.25,0.75,1)}40%{transform:scale3d(0.75,1.25,1)}50%{transform:scale3d(1.15,0.85,1)}65%{transform:scale3d(.95,1.05,1)}75%{transform:scale3d(1.05,.95,1)}to{-webkit-transform:scale3d(1,1,1);transform:scale3d(1,1,1)}}@keyframes slideup{0%{opacity:0}20%{opacity:1;bottom:0}50%{opacity:1;bottom:0}80%{opacity:1;bottom:0}100%{opacity:0;bottom:-150px;visibility:hidden}}@keyframes slidein{0%{opacity:0}20%{opacity:1;bottom:0}50%{opacity:1;bottom:0}80%{opacity:1;bottom:0}100%{opacity:0;bottom:-70px;visibility:hidden}}
